summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of the updated portfolio website. All 9 requested features verified successfully including audio visualizer preloader, mobile responsive design, updated education info, project statuses, mobile menu functionality, and social links visibility.
passed_tests: Preloader displays audio visualizer with 20 animated bars, percentage counter, and smooth completion transition
Hero section fully mobile responsive with proper viewport-based text scaling and 2 status pills (Location: Karnataka India, Status: Available for Work)
About section ID Card correctly displays 'BCA 2nd Year Student' education field
Works section shows Nyaya Mitra with ONLINE status (green indicator)
Works section shows StarkBot and VibeOS both with IN PROGRESS status (2 yellow indicators found)
Coming Soon card visible in works section with 'MORE PROJECTS COMING SOON' text and animated elements
Mobile menu (MENU button) works correctly - opens overlay with navigation items and closes properly
All 4 social links visible and properly formatted on mobile (Telegram, Instagram, GitHub, Email)
No horizontal scroll on mobile - excellent responsive design implementation
No JavaScript errors or console errors detected during testing
Smooth animations and transitions working correctly across desktop and mobile
Theme toggle functionality present and working
